name: Crafty Candy Blast
description:
Candice needs your help to collect candy from all around the world! A simple tap pops all candies of the same color - pop enough and you'll even craft some candy bombs! What are you waiting for?

- Simple Controls - just tap to pop!
- Satisfying Physics - candy has never looked so good!
- Delicious Flavors - don't try to eat the game
- Awesome Levels - pop candies, fill cauldrons and deliver chocolates!
